Name: Captain Hook
Special: TAUNT can only be applied to PETER PAN if no other heroes are in your realm.
Fate1: PETER PAN is played.
Fate2: HANGMAN'S TREE is unlocked.
Fate3: PETER PAN enters JOLLY ROGER.

Name: Jafar
Special: During setup, redraw your starting hand until you have at most one of the following cards: HYPNOTIZE, MAGIC LAMP, and SCARAB PENDANT.
Fate1: SCARAB PENDANT is played.
Fate2: MAGIC LAMP is played.
Fate3: GENIE is under your control.

Name: Maleficent
Special: If FLORA is in your realm, then curse cards cost two extra power.
Fate1: At least two curses are in your realm.
Fate2: At least four curses are in your realm.
Fate3: At least one curse is in your realm.

Name: Prince John
Special: CLEVER DISGUISE must be played on ROBIN HOOD if possible.
Fate1: End your turn with at least ten power.
Fate2: End your turn with at least twenty power.
Fate3: End your turn with at least fifteen power.

Name: Queen of Hearts
Special: MOME RATHS moves allies to the leftmost space without a hero.
Fate1: Two CARD GUARD (including wickets) are in your realm.
Fate2: Four CARD GUARD (including wickets) are in your realm.
Fate3: TAKE THE SHOT is in your hand.

Name: Ursula
Special: Flounder shuffles the discard pile unless four or more BINDING CONTRACT are in the discard pile. TRICKERY reveals the top card of your fate deck. You then choose whether to put the revealed card back on top or discard it.
Fate1: CROWN is played.
Fate2: TRIDENT is played.
Fate3: CROWN or TRIDENT enters URSULA'S LAIR.

Name: Dr. Facilier
Special: When RAY is played, Waltina takes another Automa Brain Fate Action. Waltina prioritizes allies and items for the fortune pile.
Fate1: TALISMAN is played.
Fate2: RULE NEW ORLEANS is played.
Fate3: CANE is played or in your hand.

Name: Evil Queen
Special: During setup, redraw your starting hand until you have at most two ingredients. If Waltina reveals SNOW WHITE, then you must pay six power or discard her and draw again. When SLEEPY is played, Waltina takes another Automa Brain Fate Action.
Fate1: At least two ingredients are in your realm.
Fate2: SNOW WHITE is played.
Fate3: DWARF'S COTTAGE is unlocked.

Name: Hades
Special: HERCULES cannot be played to MOUNT OLYMPUS.
Fate1: At least two titans are in your realm.
Fate2: At least one titan is at MOUNT OLYMPUS.
Fate3: At least three titans are in your realm.

Name: Ratigan
Special: Waltina moves heroes to the leftmost target location, except FLAVERSHAM who moves to the rightmost. DEVIOUS prevents the next Automa Brain Fate Action, place it on the Automa Brain as a reminder. OLIVIA triggers an Automa Brain Fate Action.
Fate1: ROBOT QUEEN is played.
Fate2: At least three items in your realm.
Fate3: RATIGAN flips to RATIGAN THE RAT.

Name: Scar
Special: If the Waltina reveals MUFASA, then you must pay eight power or discard him and draw again.
Fate1: MUFASA is played.
Fate2: The succession pile is worth at least fifteen strength.
Fate3: The succession pile is worth at least eight strength.

Name: Yzma
Special: If Waltina reveals KUZCO, then you must pay ten power or discard him.
Fate1: KUZCO is played.
Fate2: KRONK is played.
Fate3: THE DAGGER is played.

Name: Cruella de Vil
Special: Heroes are moved to the leftmost location that has the most puppies. Allies are moved to the location with the least puppies.
Preference: Largest puppy token > PONGO > PERDITA > Random
Fate1: Capture at least thirty-three puppies.
Fate2: Capture at least sixty-six puppies.
Fate3: Capture at least ninety-nine puppies.

Name: Mother Gothel
Special: PASCAL cannot be played to CORONA.
Fate1: Have at least three trust.
Fate2: Have at least five trust.
Fate3: Have at least ten trust.

Name: Pete
Special: When a goal is revealed, lose two power.
Preference: Location with the fewest allies and items > Random
Fate1: At least one goal is completed.
Fate2: At least two villain cards are in a single location.
Fate3: At least the third goal is completed.

Name: Gaston
Special: THE ROSE causes two additional Automa Brain Fate Actions. Waltina replaces obstacles in in the leftmost location with the fewest obstacles.
Fate1: At least the first obstacle is removed.
Fate2: At least the third obstacle is removed.
Fate3: At least the fifth obstacle is removed.

Name: Horned King
Special: GURGI'S HAPPY DAY causes two additional Automa Brain Fate Actions.
Preference: HEN WEN > FAIR FOLK > DYRNWYN > Random
Fate1: At least one CAULDRON BORN played.
Fate2: At least two CAULDRON BORN played.
Fate3: At least three CAULDRON BORN played.

Name: Lady Tremaine
Special: Waltina tries to move BALL GOWN allies to a location with CINDERELLA. VICIOUS PRACTICAL JOKES will cancel the first card from an Automa Brain Fate Action and force Waltina to use the next (unknown) fate card.
Fate1: THE BALLROOM is unlocked.
Fate2: ANASTASIA or DRIZELLA is played.
Fate3: BALL GOWN ANASTASIA or BALL GOWN DRIZELLA is played.

Name: Lotso
Special: Waltina tries to move heroes to THE LIBRARY and THE PLAYGROUND to block the top actions of those locations.
Preference: Hero with lowest strength > BUZZ LIGHTYEAR > Random
Fate1: At least one hero has zero strength.
Fate2: At least two heroes have zero strength.
Fate3: At least three heroes have zero strength.

Name: Madam Mim
Special: Waltina tries to move each Merlin transformation to a location without the Mim transformation that can defeat it.
Preference: Merlin transformation opposite matching Mim transformation > Random
Fate1: At least two Merlin transformations are defeated.
Fate2: At least four Merlin transformation are defeated.
Fate3: At least six Merlin transformation are defeated.

Name: Syndrome
Special: Villain Condition Action Automa Board spaces allow you to play two conditions. BIOPROBE defeats the weakest hero. INFILTRATE randomly discards one card. NOT A SIDEKICK draws two cards. WHO'S SUPER NOW? gives two power. TEAMWORK tries to put SYNDROME'S REMOTE on the bottom of the stack and shuffles anything else on top.
Fate1: One MAJOR MODIFICATIONS is in the realm.
Fate2: Three MAJOR MODIFICATIONS are in the realm.
Fate3: SYNDROME'S REMOTE is played.

Name: Oogie Boogie
Special: TRICK OR TREAT high rolls give two power and low rolls give one power.
Preference: JACK SKELLINGTON > SALLY > CITIZENS OF HALLOWEEN TOWN > Random
Fate1: At least two IMPOSTER SANDY CLAWS are next to SANDY CLAWS.
Fate2: At least three IMPOSTER SANDY CLAWS are next to SANDY CLAWS.
Fate3: JACK SKELLINGTON is played as a hero.

Name: Captain Hook
Special: TAUNT can only be applied to PETER PAN if no other heroes are in play.
Fate1: PETER PAN is played.
Fate2: PETER PAN enters JOLLY ROGER.
Fate3: At least one hero is defeated.

Name: Maleficent
Special: If FLORA is in your realm, then curse cards cost two extra power.
Fate1: At least two curses are in your realm.
Fate2: At least four curses are in your realm.
Fate3: At least one curse is in your realm.

Name: Prince John
Special: CLEVER DISGUISE must be played on ROBIN HOOD if possible.
Fate1: Have at least ten power.
Fate2: ROBIN HOOD enters THE JAIL.
Fate3: Have at least twenty power.

Name: Ursula
Special: FLOUNDER shuffles the discard pile unless four or more BINDING CONTRACT are in the discard pile. TRICKERY reveals the top card of your fate deck. You then choose whether to put the revealed card back on top or discard it.
Fate1: CROWN is played.
Fate2: TRIDENT is played.
Fate3: Either CROWN or TRIDENT enters URSULA'S LAIR.
